Name: Tywin Lannister, The Great Lion
Descriptions:
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, target any number of enemy Combat Units:
• 1 of those enemies becomes Panicked.
• 1 of those enemies becomes Vulnerable.
• 1 of those enemies suffers 4 Hits.
• 1 of those enemies suffers 1 Panic Test.
• 1 of those enemies loses all Abilities until the end of the Round.
*(The same Combat Unit may be targeted by multiple effects)*
Quote: "Some battles are won with swords and spears, others with quills and ravens."

Name: Pycelle, Grand Maester
Descriptions:
Pycelle begins the game with 3 Order tokens. 
Each time Pycelle Activates, you may remove 1 Order token from him. If you do, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They become **Weakened**.
Quote: "Pycelle is a toad. But better a Lannister toad then a Tyrell toad, no?" -Tyrion Lannister

Name: The High Sparrow, Father of the Faithful
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a Tactics Zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*: 
While Influencing an enemy, each time that enemy suffers Wounds from failing Panic Tests, target 1 friendly unit in Long Range. They restore that many Wounds, up to 3.
Quote: "I seldom feel so close to god as when I am being whipped for mine own wickedness..."

Name: Tyrion Lannister, The Imp
Descriptions:
Your maximum Tactics Hand size is increased by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when re-filling your hand.
Once per game, when an opponent plays a Tactics card, before resolving that card, you may search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Counterplot** card and play it. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
Quote: "He is a bigger man than he seems, I think."

Name: Cersei Lannister, Queen Regent
Descriptions:
Cersei begins the game with 2 Order tokens. 
Each time Cersei Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from her.
If you do, perform the following: 
If you Control [CROWN], search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Hear Me Roar!** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
If you Control [MONEY], search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Subjugation of Power** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
Quote: "When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground."

Name: Joffrey Baratheon, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms
Descriptions:
While Joffrey is on the Tactics Board, you count as Controlling [CROWN].
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While lnfluencing an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.
Quote: "His Grace has a unique way of winning the hearts of his subjects."

Name: Kevan Lannister, Master Of Law
Descriptions:
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, target any number of friendly Combat Units:
• 1 of those units restores 2 Wounds.
• 1 of those units removes all Condition tokens.
• 1 of those units performs a 2" shift.
• Until the end of the Round, 1 of those units Attacks using its highest Attack Die Value, and may re-roll any Attack Dice.
*(The same Combat Unit may be targeted by multiple effects)*
Quote: "The gods shaped him to be a follower, not a leader." -Tyrion Lannister

Name: Qyburn, Master Of Whisperers
Descriptions:
Qyburn begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time an enemy NCU activates, you may remove 1 Order token from Qyburn. If you do, choose 2 zones. If that NCU Claims either zone this Turn, after resolving that zone's effect, target up to 2 enemy Combat Units. They become **Vulnerable**.
Quote: "Your secrets are safe with me."
Restrictions: *May not be fielded in an army containing Varys.*

Name: Tommen Baratheon, Next in Succession
Descriptions:
Tommen begins the game with 2 Order tokens.
Each time Tommen Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from him. If you do, perform the following:
If you Control [CROWN], search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Intrigue and Subterfuge** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
If you Control [MONEY], search your Tactics deck or discard pile for 1 **Bribery** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
Quote: "When I'm king in my own right, I'm going to outlaw beets."

Name: Catelyn Stark, Lady of Winterfell
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
Each time Catelyn Influences a unit, remove 1 Condition token from them.
While lnfluencing a unit, that unit Attacks using its highest Attack Die Value.
Quote: "Show me the path I must walk and do not let me stumble in the dark places that lie ahead."

Name: Sansa Stark, Little Bird
Descriptions:
Once per game, when Sansa Activates, you may return 1 Tactics card from your discard pile to your hand.
Each time Sansa Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Return 1 Tactics card from your discard pile to your hand.*
Quote: "The Hound is right ... I am only a little bird, repeating the words they taught me."

Name: Eddard Stark, Warden of the North
Names: Bravery in the Face of Death
Descriptions:
Eddard begins the game with 4 Order tokens on him.
Each time a friendly unit is performing a Panic Test, after rolling dice, you may remove 1 Order token from Eddard. If you do, that unit may re-roll any dice for this test.
Each time a friendly unit passes a Panic Test, you may remove 1 Order token from Eddard. If you do, that unit restores 2 Wounds, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.
Quote:
"You wear your honor like a suit of armor, Stark."
-Petyr Baelish

Name: Rodrik Cassel, Combat Veteran
Descriptions:
Each time Rodrik Claims [SWORDS], target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They become **Vulnerable**.
Rodrik begins the game with 2 Order tokens on him.
Each time a friendly Combat Unit is performing a Melee Attack, after rolling Attack Dice, you may remove 1 Order Token from Rodrik. If you do, the Attacker may re-roll any Attack Dice.
Quote: "There is no better trainer than Rodrik."

Name: Arya Stark, The Wolf Girl
Descriptions: Arya begins the game with 2 Order tokens on her. At the start of an enemy Turn, you may remove 1 Order token from Arya. If you do, target 1 friendly lnfantry unit. lt performs 1 Maneuver or Retreat Action.
Quote: "Boy, girl, you are a sword, that is all." -Syrio Forel

Name: Howland Reed, Protector of the Neck
Descriptions:
**Influence** (*When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round*):
While Influencing an enemy unit, they treat all Terrain as having the Hindering keyword.
While Influencing an enemy unit, when that unit performs a Melee Attack, before resolving that Action, you may remove this card from that unit. If you do, that Attack suffers -1 to Hit.
Quote: "He could talk to trees and weave words and make castles appear and disappear."

Name: Eddard Stark, Hand of The King
Descriptions:
At the start of any Turn, you may destroy Eddard. If you do, target 1 enemy NCU. That NCU cannot Activate and loses all Abilities until the end of the Round. /
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a unit, each time that unit is targeted by an NCU Ability or Tactics Zone, you may cancel the effect of that NCU or zone.
Quote: "I have met so few of them in my life... When I see what honesty and honor have won you, I understand why..." -Varys

Name: Lyanna Mormont, Youngest She-Bear
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, it gains the following based on the number of destroyed friendly Combat Units *(effects are cumulative)*:
**0+:** Unit gains +1 to Morale Test rolls.
**1+:** Melee Attacks gain **Critical Blow**.
**2+:** Automatically passes all Panic Tests.
**3+:** May re-roll any Attack Dice.
Quote: "Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North, whose name is STARK."

Name: Robb Stark, King in the North
Descriptions: At the start of Deployment, you may target 1 friendly Combat Unit. Until the end of the game, that unit gains the Outflank Ability: OUTFLANK You may hold this unit off the table (In Reserve) instead of Deploying it. At the start of any Round, if you are not the first player, you may place 1 unit from Reserve fully within Short Range of a Friendly or Flank table edge, unactivated. / Influence (When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round): While influencing a friendly unit, that unit gains +1 [MOVEMENT].
Quote: "I thought the battles would be the hard part..."
Restrictions: *Your army may not contain Eddard Stark.*

Name: Lady Val, The Wildling Princess
Descriptions:
Each time Lady Val Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*1 Friendly Combat Unit performs 1 Maneuver or Retreat Action.*
Quote: "I know the forest better than all your black-cloaked rangers. It holds no ghosts for me."

Name: Mance Rayder, Artful Tactician
Descriptions:
**Influence*** (When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round):*
While Influencing a unit, each time that unit Activates, or is targeted by a Tactics Zone, before resolving that zone's effect, you may draw 1 Tactics card.
Quote: "Mance has cunning. He was raised a crow, you know, and the crow's a tricksy bird."

Name: Craster, Ally of Convenience
Descriptions:
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly Infantry unit.
Each time Craster Claims a zone, you may replace its effect with:
*Draw 1 Tactics card and restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly Infantry Unit.*
Quote: "He's never turned a ranger away from his fire, nor does he love Mance Rayder..."

Name: Styr, Iron-Fisted Tyrant
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round):*
While Influencing a friendly unit, that unit's Melee Attacks gain **Sundering** and it is treated as having +1 rank for Attack Dice.
Quote: "These are wildlings... more beast than man."

Name: Ygritte, Kissed by Fire
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, that unit gains +1 [MOVEMENT] and ignores the Hindering and Rough keywords.
While Influencing an enemy unit, that enemy suffers -1 [MOVEMENT] and triggers Disorderly Charges on rolls of 1 or 2.
Quote: "I know one thing. I know that you are wildling to the bone" -Jon Snow

Name: Lady Dalla, Wife and Council
Descriptions:
Each time Dalla Claims a zone, perform the following based on the zone she Claimed:
[CROWN]: 1 enemy becomes **Weakened**.
[MONEY]: Instead of removing a Condition token, target 1 enemy engaged with that unit. They suffer 1 Hit, +1 Hit for each remaining rank in this unit.
[LETTER]: Instead of drawing cards, look at the top 2 cards of your opponent's Tactics deck. You may discard one of those cards. Then, place the remaining cards on the top of the Tactics deck.
Quote: "We free folk know things you kneelers have forgotten. Sometimes the short road is not the safest, Jon Snow."

Name: Mance Rayder, Deceptive Bard
Descriptions:
Once per game, when an enemy NCU Activates, that NCU loses all Abilities until the end of the Round. /
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing an enemy unit, your opponent may not target that unit with Tactics Zone effects or Influence Abilities.
Quote: "The Wall can stop an army, but not a man alone."

Name: Jon Snow, Turncloak Crow
Descriptions:
**Influence** (*When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round*):
While Influencing a unit, it gains +1 to Morale Test rolls and suffers -1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.. /
Once per game, at the start of any Round, you may search your Tactics deck or discard pile for one **Cooordination Tactics** or **Regroup and Reform** Tactics card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics deck.
Quote: "Mance Rayder swore an oath as well..."

Name: Petyr Baelish, Littlefinger
Descriptions:
Petyr Baelish starts the game with 2 Order Tokens.
Each time Petyr Claims a zone, you may spend 1 Order token to replace its effect with the effect of any unclaimed zone.
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may select 1 zone. Until the end of the Round, you count as Controlling that zone.
Quote: "In King's Landing, there are two sorts of people. The players and the pieces."

Name: Lord Varys, The Spider
Descriptions:
Varys begins the game with 3 Order tokens.
Each time an enemy NCU Claims a zone, after resolving that zone's effect, you may remove 1 Order token from Varys. If you do, gain the following based on that zone:
[CROWN]: 1 enemy suffers 1 Panic Test.
[MONEY]: Restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly unit.
[LETTER]: Draw 1 Tactics card.
[SWORDS]: 1 enemy suffers 3 Hits.
[HORSE]: 1 friendly unit shifts 3".
Quote: "Varys has ways of learning things that no man could know."

Name: The High Seneschal
Names: History is Written by the Victors
Descriptions:
**The High Seneschal cannot activate and cannot be targeted in any way. He merely observes the battle.**
Once the victor has been determined, that player may define all actions and events that transpired throughout the game. No opponent may refute or deny any retelling of said events *(regardless of how unlikely or exaggerated)* until such a time where they best the victor in a new game.
Quote: "He is the keeper of this world's history."

Name: Jaqen H'ghar, Follower of The Red God
Names:
Choosing a Name /
A Name Given
Descriptions:
Each time Jaqen Activates, he may replace his Influence Ability with the Influence Ability of any friendly or enemy NCU until the end of the Round. /
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a friendly Infantry unit, its Melee Attacks gain **Precision**.
Quote: "The Red God has his due, sweet girl, and only death may pay for life."

Name: Tycho Nestoris, Iron Banker
Descriptions: Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may restore 5 Wounds *(total)* across any number of friendly Combat Units.
Quote: "We who serve the Iron Bank face death full as often as you who serve the Iron Throne."

Name: Walder Frey, Lord of the Crossing
Descriptions:
Once per game, when Walder Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Choose 2:
• 1 enemy becomes Weakened, Vulnerable and Panicked. 
• 1 friendly unit restores 3 Wounds.
• At the start of the next Round, you become the First Player.*
Quote: "He has an old man's caution and a young man's ambition, and has never lacked for cunning."

Name: Roose Bolton, Calculating and Cruel
Descriptions:
Roose begins the game with 3 Order tokens. 
Each time Roose Activates, you may remove 1 Order token from him. 
If you do, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They become **Panicked**.
Each time Roose Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*1 enemy Combat Unit suffers 1 Panic Test.*
Quote: "You had only to look at Bolton to know that he had more cruelty in his pinky toe than all the Freys combined."

Name: Shae, Hidden in Court
Descriptions:
Shae begins the game with 3 Order tokens. Each time Shae Claims a zone, after resolving that zone's effect, remove 1 Order token from Shae.
At the end of each Round, if Shae has no Order tokens, destroy Shae.
Each time Shae Claims a zone, before resolving that zone's effect, choose 1:
  • Restore 1 Wound to 1 friendly Unit.
  • 1 enemy Unit becomes **Weakened**.
  • Shae gains 2 Order tokens.
Quote:
"My mother named me Shae.
Men call me ... often."

Name: Bowen Marsh, First Steward
Descriptions: Each time Bowen Claims a zone, you may look at the top 2 cards of your Tactics Deck. Place 1 of those cards in your hand and the other on the bottom of your Tactics Deck.
Quote: "For the Watch."

Name: Aemon, Maester of Castle Black
Descriptions: Each time Aemon Claims a zone, you may target 1 friendly Combat Unit. That unit restores 1 Wound, +1 additional Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.
Quote: "Knowledge is a weapon, Jon. Arm yourself well before you ride forth to battle."

Name: Jeor Mormont, The Old Bear
Names: Duty To The Realms Of Men
Descriptions:
Each time Jeor Claims a zone, you may target 2 friendly Night's Watch Combat Units. Move 1 friendly attached Tactics card from 1 of those units to the other.
Once per game, when Jeor Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Take 1 Tactics card that can be attached to a unit from your discard pile and attach it to a friendly Night's Watch unit.*
Quote: "The Wall was made to guard the realms of men... and not against other men"

Name: Qhorin Halfhand, Unwavering Ranger
Names:
Sacrifice For The Cause / 
Halfhand's Guidance
Descriptions:
At the start of any Turn, if Qhorin is not on the Tactics Board, you may destroy him. If you do, target 1 enemy unit. That enemy becomes **Vulnerable**, and cannot perform Attack or Charge Actions this Round. /
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round):*
While Influencing a friendly Cavalry or Infantry unit, it gains + 1 Attack Die.
Quote: "Our honor means no more than our lives, so long as the realm is safe."

Name: Donal Noye, Expert Blacksmith
Descriptions:
Donal begins the game with 2 Order Tokens on him.
Each time a unit is performing an Attack, after rolling Attack Dice, you may remove 1 Order Token from Donal. If you do, choose 1:
• Attacker may re-roll any Attack Dice and opponents cannot expend **Weakened** tokens from them.
• Defender gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls and opponents cannot expend **Vulnerable** tokens from them.
Quote: "The Watch is not what it was. Too few honest men to keep the rogues in line."

Name: Othell Yarwyck, Warmachine Specialist
Descriptions:
Each time Othell Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Make the following Ranged Attack on 1 enemy Combat Unit:*
[ATTACK:Ranged:Ranged Volley:3+3]
*Gains +1 Attack Die for each of the Defenders remaining ranks.*
Quote: "This will show them how we deal with their kind."

Name: Samwell Tarly, Craven Scholar
Descriptions: Increase your Tactics Hand Size limit by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when refilling your hand.
Quote:
"I can't command you to be brave, but I can
command you to hide your fears." -Jon Snow

Name: Gilly, The Wildling Girl
Descriptions:
At the start of the game, after drawing your Tactics Hand, you may draw 1 Tactics Card, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into your Tactics Deck. /
Gilly begins the game with 1 Order token. Each time Gilly Claims a zone, after resolving that zone's effect, remove 1 Order token from Gilly.
At the end of each Round, if Gilly has no Order token, destroy Gilly.
Quote: "Well I think you're quite brave."
Restrictions: *May only be fielded in an army including **Samwell Tarly, Craven Scholar**.*

Name: Craster, Ally of the Watch
Descriptions:
**Influence*** (When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
Each time Craster Influences a unit, remove 1 Condition token from them.
While Influencing a unit, that unit ignores the Rough and Hindering keyword.
Quote:
"The man's half-mad, I won't deny
it, but you'd be the same if you'd spent
your life in this cursed wood."

Name: Yoren, Wandering Crow
Descriptions: Each time Yoren Claims a zone, before resolving that zone's effect, place 1 Order token on him. Each time Yoren Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with: Place 1 Order token on Yoren. At the start of any Round, you may remove 4 Order tokens from Yoren. If you do, Deploy 1 Conscripts unit fully within Long Range of a friendly Table Edge.
Quote: "I'm here to find men for the Wall..."

Name: Ser Denys Mallister, Honorable Brother
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, each time it performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, choose 1. For each destroyed rank in this unit, choose +1:
•This unit's Melee Attacks may re-roll any Attack Dice.
•This unit rolls its highest Attack Die Value.
•1 enemy engaged with this unit gains 1 Condition token.
Quote: "The men of the Night's Watch dressed in black, Ser Denys Mallister reminded me sternly, as if I had forgotten." -Mance Rayder

Name: Alester Florent, Lord of Brightwater
Descriptions:
Alester begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time Alester Claims a zone, after resolving that zone's effect, you may remove 1 Order Token from him. If you do, move him to any empty zone, or switch zones with any other NCU.
Quote: "...a man who changes kings and gods the way I change my boots." -Cortnay Penrose

Name: Shyra Errol, Lady of Haystack Hall
Descriptions:
Each time Shyra Claims [CROWN], restore 1 Wound to 1 friendly Combat Unit.
Each time Shyra Claims [LETTER], remove 1 Condition Token from 1 friendly Combat Unit.
Each time Shyra Claims [MONEY], if you remove a token, place 1 Condition Token of that type on 1 enemy Combat Unit.
Quote: "Sworn to House Baratheon... First Renly, then Stannis."

Name: Melisandre, The Red Woman
Names:
Sacrifice To The Lord Of Light /
Loyalty: Stannis Baratheon
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
When Melisandre Influences a friendly unit, you may have them suffer 2 Wounds and 1 Panic Test. If you do, target 1 enemy Combat Unit in Long Range. That enemy suffers 1 Panic Test with -2 to their roll and +2 Wounds on failure.
While influencing a friendly unit, that unit is a R'hllor unit and its Melee Attacks gain **Vicious**.
Quote: "Lady Melisandre wore no crown, but every man there knew that she was Stannis Baratheon’s real queen."
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Davos Seaworth, Hand of The True King
Descriptions:
Davos begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time a friendly unit Charges, after rolling Charge Distance Dice, you may remove 1 token from Davos. If you do, you may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice.
Each time a friendly unit Activates, you may remove 1 token from Davos. If you do, until the end of the Turn, enemies engaged with that unit may not use Orders or be the target of friendly Tactics cards.
Quote: "Kings and corpses always draw attendants."
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Selyse & Shireen, Queen and Princess
Names:
Fervent Conviction /
Necessary Sacrifices /
Loyalty: Stannis Baratheon
Descriptions:
**Influence ***(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a unit, each time it passes a Morale Test, 1 enemy it is engaged with suffers 1 Wound. /
Once per game, when a friendly Combat Unit would be destroyed, instead, that unit is not destroyed and remains in play with D3 Wounds. Until the end of the game, it is a R'hllor unit.
Quote: "The red woman had won her, heart and soul, turning her from the gods of the Seven Kingdoms."
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Axell Florent, Hand of the Queen
Names:
In R'hllor's Name /
Loyalty: Stannis Baratheon
Descriptions:
**Influence*** (When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
Each time Axell Influences an enemy unit, it becomes **Panicked**.
While Influencing a friendly unit, when that unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, the Defender becomes **Vulnerable**.
Quote: "If you are truly the Queen's Hand, I pity her Grace." -Jon Snow
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Margaery Tyrell, Little Rose
Names:
A Rose and its Thorns /
Loyalty: Renly Baratheon
Descriptions: Each time Margaery Claims a zone, you may target 1 friendly Combat Unit. They restore 1 Wound. You may then target 1 enemy engaged with that unit. They become **Vulnerable**.
Quote: "The girl is a maid of fourteen, sweet and beautiful and tractable." -Varys
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **RENLY BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Olenna Tyrell, Queen of Thorns
Descriptions:
Each time Olenna Claims a zone, target 1 enemy NCU and choose 1:
• That NCU loses all Abilities until the end of the Round.
• If that NCU Claims a zone this Round, before resolving that zone's effect, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They suffer D3 Hits and becomes **Weakened**.
Quote: "All men are fools, if truth be told, but the ones in motley are more amusing than the ones in crowns."
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **RENLY BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Eldon Estermont, Venerable Knight
Descriptions:
Each time Eldon Claims a zone, you may replace that Zone's effect with: 
*Draw 3 Tactics Cards, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into your Tactics Deck.*
Quote: "An old knight, nearing seventy, he is the Lord of Greenstone"
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **RENLY BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Cortnay Penrose, Reliable Castellan
Descriptions:
Cortnay begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time an enemy NCU activates, you may remove 1 Order token from Cortnay. If you do, choose 2 zones. If that NCU Claims either zone this Turn, before resolving that zone's effect, target any number of friendly Combat Units. Restore D3+2 Wounds *(total)* across these units.
Quote: "Is it the justice of your cause you doubt, my lord, or the strength of your arm?"
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **RENLY BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Cressen, Maester at Dragonstone
Names:
Sacrifice for the King /
Loving Counsel /
Loyalty: Stannis Baratheon
Descriptions:
At the start of any Round, you may Activate Cressen. If you do, destroy Cressen at the end of the Round. /
Each time Cressen Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Draw 2 Tactics cards and place any 1 Condition Token on an enemy Combat Unit.*
Quote:
"I had a maester on Dragonstone who was
almost a father to me."- Stannis Baratheon
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Patchface, Patches
Descriptions:
Patchface begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
At the start of any Round, you may spend 1 Order token from him. If you do, you may state the name of a Tactics card. If your opponent has 1 or more Tactics card in their hand with that name, they must discard 1 Tactics card with that name.
Quote:
"Here we eat fish, under the sea,
the fish eat us. I know. I know…"
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **STANNIS BARATHEON**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Daenerys Targaryen, Khaleesi
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit claims a Tactics Zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
Each time Daenerys Influences a unit, remove 1 Condition token from them.
While Influencing a unit, that unit's Melee Attacks may re-roll any Attack Dice.
Quote: "My sun-and-stars made a queen of me, but if he had been a different man, it might have been much otherwise."

Name: Illyrio Mopatis, Magister of Pentos
Descriptions: Illyrio begins the game with 2 Order tokens. Each time Illyrio Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from him. If you do, replace that zone's effect with: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit. They restore up to 3 Wounds. Place 1 Condition token on 1 enemy they are engaged with.
Quote: "You Westerosi are all the same. You sew some beast upon a scrap of silk, and suddenly you are all lions or dragons or eagles."

Name: Pyat Pree, Warlock of Qarth
Descriptions:
Each time Pyat Pree Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Your opponent must reveal all Tactics card from their hand.*
*Then, your opponent must discard 1 Tactics card at random from their hand.*
Once per game, when Pyat Pree Claims [UNDYING], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Return 1 Tactics card from your discard pile to your hand.*
Quote: "Come with me to the House of the Undying, and you shall drink of truth and wisdom."

Name: Barristan Selmy, Advisor to the Dragon
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the round)*:
While Influencing a unit, each time that unit is targeted by an enemy Ability or Tactics card, you may remove this card from that unit to cancel the effect of that Ability or Tactics card.
Quote: "Men can always ﬁght, Your Grace. Ask rather if we can win."

Name: Xaro Xhoan Daxos, Merchant Prince of Qarth
Descriptions:
Xaro begins the game with 2 Order Tokens on him.
Each time Xaro Claims [MONEY], place 1 Order token on him. 
When a Combat Unit performs an Attack, you may remove 1 Order token from Xaro and target that Combat Unit. If you do, choose 1 of the following for the unit to gain/suffer until the end of that Attack:
• This unit is treated as having +1 rank for Attack Dice.
• This unit is treated as having -1 rank for Attack Dice.
Quote: "I no longer lust for dragons. I saw their work at Astapor."

Name: Daenerys Targaryen, The Unburnt
Descriptions:
Each time Daenerys Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*1 friendly **Drogon**, **Rhaegal**, or **Viserion** unit performs 1 Attack Action.*
Quote: "I am blood of the dragon. I am Daenerys Stormborn, Princess of Dragonstone, of the blood and seed of Aegon the Conqueror."
Restrictions: *Reduce the cost of 1 **Drogon**, **Rhaegal**, or **Viserion** unit in your army by 1.*

Name: Mirri Maz Duur, Godswife
Descriptions:
Each time Mirri Claims a zone, restore 1 Wound to 1 friendly Combat Unit.
Each time Mirri Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Choose 1:
• Target 1 friendly Combat Unit.
Attach 1 previously destroyed, friendly,
non-Commander Attachment to that unit, replacing a model as usual, but ignoring the usual Attachment limits.
• Target 1 enemy Combat Unit.
They become Panicked and Weakened.*
Quote:
"Look to your khal and see what life
is worth, when all the rest is gone."

Name: Quaithe, Of The Shadow
Descriptions:
Quaithe begins the game with 2 Order tokens on her.
At the start of an enemy Turn, you may remove 1 Order token from Quaithe. If you do, target 1 enemy unit.
If that unit performs an Action this Turn, before resolving that Action, 1 of your friendly Combat Units may perform 1 Maneuver, March, or Retreat Action.
Quote:
"What do you want of me, Quaithe?"
"To show you the way."
-Daenerys and Quaithe

Name: Hizdahr Zo Loraq, Fourteenth Of That Noble Name
Descriptions:
Each time a friendly NCU Claims a zone, unless its effect is replaced, its effect gains the following additional bonus:
[CROWN]: If the unit fails this Panic Test, it may not be the target of friendly Orders this Round.
[MONEY]: 1 other friendly unit in Short Range restores 1 Wound.
[LETTER]: May draw 1 fewer Tactics cards to place +1 Condition token on the targeted enemy.
[UNDYING]: Also discard the top card of your opponent's Tactics deck.
Quote:
"One day all men must die,
but it serves no good to dwell on death."

Name: Missandei, Scribe
Descriptions:
At the start of the game, search your Tactics Deck for 1 Commander Tactics card and place it face-down near this card.
Once per game, at the start of a friendly Turn, you may discard 1 Tactics card from your hand. If you do, take the face-down card and add it to your hand.
Quote:
"Eleven years of age, yet Missandei
is as clever as half the men at this table
and wiser than all of them."

Name: Alicent Hightower, Dowager Queen
Names:
Ways Of The Court /
Loyalty: Greens
Descriptions:
Each time Alicent Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
For each Controlled zone on the Tactics Board *(by friendly and enemy NCUs)*, place 1 Condition Token on 1 enemy Combat Unit.
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **GREENS**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Rhaenyra Targaryen, Dragon Queen
Descriptions:
Rhaenyra begins the game with 2 Order tokens.
Each time an enemy Combat Unit Activates you may expend 1 Order token from Rhaenyra.
If you do, that enemy Combat Unit becomes **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.
Restrictions:
Loyalty: **BLACKS**
*Your army may never contain Units or Attachments with different Loyalties.*

Name: Rodrik Harlaw, The Reader
Descriptions:
Rodrik begins the game with 2 Order Tokens.
At the start of any Turn, you may remove 1 Order token from Rodrik. If you do, place any number of Tactics cards from your hand to the side, then draw 1+ that many cards. Shuffle the cards you set aside into your Tactics Deck.
Quote: "I prefer my history dead. Dead history is writ in ink, the living sort in blood."

Name: Aeron Greyjoy, The Damphair
Descriptions:
**Aeron may only Influence Greyjoy units.**
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round):*
While Influencing a unit, when that unit performs an Action, before resolving that Action, it restores 1 Wound. Each time it destroys an enemy rank with a Melee Attack, it restores 1 Wound.
Quote: "What is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger."

Name: Balon Greyjoy, King of Salt and Rock
Descriptions: Once per game, when Balon activates, instead of Claiming a Zone, redeploy 1 previously destroyed House Greyjoy Combat Unit fully within Long Range of a friendly Deployment Edge, or fully within Short Range of any Flank table edge. It deploys without any Pillage tokens it previously had. If the unit had not Activated this Round, it deploys Unactivated. Otherwise, it deploys Activated.
Quote: "No man has ever died from bending his knee. He who kneels may rise again, blade in hand."

Name: Wendamyr, Maester of the House Greyjoy
Descriptions:
When Wendamyr Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Place 1 Order token on Wendamyr.*
At the start of a friendly Turn, you may remove 1 Order token from Wendamyr. If you do, choose 1:
• Draw 1 Tactics card and restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly Combat Unit.
• 1 friendly Combat Unit performs a 3" shift.
Quote: "If you do not have a maester, it is taken to mean that you are of little consequence."

Name: Erik Ironmaker, The Just
Names: Gifts of Iron, Gold, and Steel
Descriptions:
At the start of the game, place 1 Pillage token on Erik. 
When Erik or an enemy NCU claims [MONEY] place 1 Pillage token on Erik.
When Erik Claims a zone other than [MONEY], you may remove 1 Pillage token from him and place it on 1 friendly Greyjoy unit.
Quote: "If old is wise, no one is wiser than me. If big is strong, no one's stronger."

Name: Tristifer Botley, Lord of Lordsport
Descriptions:
Once per game, when an enemy NCU Activates, you may select 2 Tactics Zones. If that NCU Claims either zone this Activation, target up to 2 enemy Combat Units. they become** Panicked **and **Vulnerable**.
Once per game, when an enemy NCU Activates, if Tristifer is not on the Tactics Board, you may select 1 Tactics Zone. If that NCU Claims that zone this Turn, at the end of the Turn, you may Activate Tristifer.
Quote: "Sweet eyes, truly. That was the trouble with poor Tristifer; he was too sweet for the Iron Islands." -Asha Greyjoy

Name: Moqorro, The Black Flame
Descriptions:
Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may use this ability. If you do, until the end of the Turn, your opponent may not use Orders or Tactics card.
Once per game, when Moqorro Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Return 1 previously destroyed friendly Attachment to a friendly Combat Unit, replacing a model as usual but ignoring the usual Attachment limits.*
Quote: "Why do you say this man is a wizard? I see only a ragged red priest." -Victarion Greyjoy to Rodrik Sparr

Name: Beron Blacktyde, Blind Beron
Descriptions:
**Beron may only Influence Greyjoy units.
Influence** (*When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round*):**
**While Influencing a friendly unit, that unit may re-roll any Morale Test dice and gains the **Hardened** Ability:
**HARDENED**
*Each time an enemy is performing an Attack on this unit, after rolling Defense Dice, this unit blocks 1 Hit for each of its destroyed ranks.*
Quote: "ASHA! ASHA QUEEN!" - Blind Beron, in support of Asha Greyjoy at the Kingsmoot

Name: Asha Greyjoy, Would-be Queen
Descriptions:
**Influence ***(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round):*
Each time Asha Influences a unit, remove 1 Condition token from them.
While Influencing a friendly unit, 
that unit gains +1 to Morale Test rolls for each Pillage token on it. Each time that unit passes a Morale Test, target 1 enemy it is engaged with. That enemy suffers 1 Hit for each Pillage token on this unit.
Quote: "Your choice is simple. Crown me, for peace and victory. Or crown my uncle, for more war and more defeat."

Name: Doran Martell, Lord of Sunspear
Descriptions:
Each time Doran Martell Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Choose 1:
• Areo Hotah's unit may Pivot then perform 1 March Action.
• Areo Hotah's unit may perform 1 Retreat Action.*
Quote: "I am not blind, nor deaf."

Name: Doran Martell, Prince of Dorne
Descriptions:
Each time Doran Claims a zone, before resolving that zone's effect, place 1 Order token on him. If Doran Claims [OASIS], place +1 Order token on him.
Each time Doran Claims [OASIS] you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Remove up to 4 Order tokens from a friendly Doran, for each Order token removed, choose 1:
• Restore up to 2 Wounds from 1 unit.
• Remove 1 Condition token from 1 unit.
• Draw 1 Tactics Card.
• Place any 1 Condition token on an enemy unit.
• 1 friendly unit pivots, then shifts 2".
• 1 enemy Combat Unit suffers 1 Wound.*
Quote: "Who fears to walk upon the grass?"

Name: Ellaria Sand, Viper's Paramour
Descriptions:
Each time Ellaria Claims a zone, target 1 friendly Combat Unit. You may remove 1 Condition token from them.
If you Control [SWORDS], target 1 enemy unit in Long Range of the targeted friendly unit. They gain 1 Condition token.
Quote: "Where does it end?"

Name: Oberyn Martell, Red Viper
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a friendly unit, each time an enemy Attacks this unit with a Melee Attack, after resolving that Attack, the Attacker suffers 1 Hits, +1 Hit for each of the Defender's remaining Ranks.
Quote: "Oberyn has always been half mad." -Tywin Lannister

Name: Tyene Sand, Septa's Daughter
Descriptions:
Each time Tyene Claims a zone, you may target 1 friendly Combat unit. They restore 1 Wound.
At the Start of Round 2, choose 1 Tactics Zone. The next time an enemy NCU Claims that zone, attach **The Strangler** posion card to that NCU.
[SKILL:Venom]
Quote: "White suits my coloring. I look so ... pure."

Name: Nymeria Sand, Lady Nym
Descriptions: Influence (When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round): While Influencing a friendly Infantry unit: • If you or your opponent Controls [CROWN], its Melee Attacks gain **Vicious**. • If you or your opponent Controls [SWORDS], its Melee Attacks gain **Critical blow**. • If you or your opponent Controls [HORSE], it gains +1[MOVEMENT].
Quote: "Only royal blood can wash out my father's murder."

Name: Arianne Martell, Heiress To Dorne
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
Each time Arianne Martell Influences a unit, Choose 1:
• While Influencing an enemy unit, Attachments on that unit lose all Abilities.
• While Influencing an enemy unit, they cannot be the target of friendly Orders.
Quote: "I was a foolish willful girl, playing at the game of thrones like a drunkard rolling dice."

Name: Arys Oakheart, Crown's Ambassador
Descriptions:
Once per game, during the Clean-up Phase, you may keep Arys Oakheart on the Tactics Board. He does not Activate next Round.
If Arys Oakheart begins any Round on the Tactics Board, target 1 enemy Combat Unit, they become **Weakened**.
Quote: "There have always been men who found it easier to speak vows than to keep them."

Name: Walda Frey, Fat Walda
Descriptions:
Each time Walda Claims [CROWN], 1 enemy Combat Unit becomes **Weakened**.
Each time Walda Claims [LETTER], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 of your **Commander's** Tactics cards and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.*
Each time Walda Claims [MONEY], instead of removing a Condition token, you may restore +1 Wound.
Quote: "I have become oddly fond of my fat little wife. "

Name: Jeyne Poole, Arya Stark, Bride Of Bolton
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*.
While Influencing a unit, that unit gains +2 to Morale Test rolls.
Once per game, at the start of any Round, you may have your opponent gain control of Jeyne until the end of the Round. If you do, you become the First Player. Jeyne cannot Influence a unit that Round.
Quote: "I pray that I will make you a good wife and give you strong sons to follow after you."

Name: Roose Bolton, Calculating And Cruel
Descriptions:
Roose begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
When Roose Activates, you may remove 1 Order token from him. If you do, 1 enemy Combat Unit becomes **Panicked**.
When Roose Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*1 enemy Combat Unit suffers 1 Panic Test.*
Quote: "You had only to look at Bolton to know that he had more cruelty in his pinky toe than all the Freys combined."

Name: Ramsay Snow, Red Helm
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*.
While Influencing a friendly House Bolton unit, it's Melee Attacks gain **Fueled by Slaughter:**
*After this unit completes a Melee Attack, if the Defender suffered any Wounds, it restores 1 Wound, +1 additional Wound for each of the Defender's destroyed ranks.*
Quote: "Power tastes best when sweetened by courtesy; you had best learn that if you ever hope to rule."

Name: Tybald, Maester of the Dreadfort
Descriptions:
Tybald begins the game with 2 Order tokens on him.
Each time an enemy NCU Activates, if Tybald is not on the Tactics Board, you may remove 1 Order token from Tybald. If you do, target 1 zone.
If that NCU Claims that zone, after resolving that zone's effect, 1 enemy Combat Unit becomes **Vulnerable**.
If that NCU does not Claim that zone this Turn, at the end of the Turn, Tybald Claims that zone.
Quote: "Isn't it clever how the maesters go only by one name, even those who had two when they first arrived at the Citadel?"

Name: Ghost of High Heart, The Wood's Witch
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a unit, that unit gains +1 to Morale Test rolls. 
Each time a rank in that unit is destroyed, 1 enemy they are engaged with becomes **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.
Quote: "She has her own ways of knowing things, that one. The weirwoods whisper in her ear when she sleeps."

Name: Ravella Smallwood, Lady of Acorn Hall
Descriptions:
Ravella begins the game with 3 Order tokens on her.
At the start of a friendly Turn, you may discard 1 Order token and 1 Tactics card. 
If you do, restore 2 Wounds to 1 friendly Combat Unit. If that unit has only 1 remaining rank, also remove 1 Condition token from them.
Quote: "With their help, we fight on as best we can, for Robert and the realm"

Name: Catelyn Stark, The Hangwoman
Descriptions:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing an enemy Combat Unit, each time this unit performs an Action, before resolving that Action, this unit suffers 1 Wound.
Friendly Combat Units may re-roll any Attack Dice when performing Melee Attacks against this unit.
Requirements:
Not: 'Beric Dondarrion'
Rules: 51102
Not: 'House Bolton'
Not: 'Dreadfort Captain'
Not: 'Bolton Flayer'
Not: 'Roose Bolton'
Not: 'Ramsay Snow'
Not: 'Walder Frey'
Quote: " ...she rose. May the Lord of Light protect us. She rose." -Thoros of Myr
Restrictions: *May not be fielded in an army containing Beric Dondarrion.*

Name: Thoros of Myr, The Ember
Descriptions:
Each time a rank in an enemy Combat Unit is destroyed, place 1 Order token on Thoros.
Each time Thoros Claims a zone, you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Restore up to 2 Wounds to 1 friendly Combat Unit. Then, you may remove up to 2 Order tokens from Thoros. If you do, for each token removed, restore 1 Wound to 1 friendly Combat Unit.*
Quote: "That was unkind. True, but unkind."
